title: For future economic growth, invest in care
description: The Nobel Committee has weighed in: childcare is not just a family issue, it’s an economic one. We’ve all needed or provided care at some point in our lives — for ourselves, our children, or elderly or sick family members or friends — but the labor involved in providing that care has been systematically undervalued....

title: Raskin says second Trump term would 'look a lot like Vladimir Putin in Russia'
description: Rep. Jamie Raskin (D-Md.) on Sunday compared a hypothetical second Trump White House term to that of President Vladimir Putin's Russia and other authoritarian leaders in response to Trump's veiled threats that he would go after his political opponents if reelected. "Well, the role of the government in his view is to advance his political...

title: Murphy says Manchin third-party run would hurt Trump more than Biden
description: Sen. Chris Murphy (D-Conn.) on Sunday said he believes a third-party presidential run by Sen. Joe Manchin (D-W.Va.) would take away more votes from former President Trump than from President Biden, while noting he isn't "terribly worried," the West Virginia senator will launch a White House bid. Manchin, 76, announced last week he will not...

title: After Ohio's legalization vote, here's where marijuana is — and isn't — legal
description: Ohio is the 24th state to legalize recreational marijuana.

title: RNC chair on Ramaswamy: ‘He’s at 4 percent. He’s looking for headlines’
description: Republican National Committee Chair Ronna McDaniel on Sunday fired back at GOP candidate for president Vivek Ramaswamy after he targeted her from the debate stage this past week. “Last I checked, I wasn't running for president. He's at 4 percent,” McDaniel told CNN’s Dana Bash on “State of the Union." "He's looking for headlines.” “I...

title: 5 killed after military aircraft crashes into eastern Mediterranean Sea
description: Five U.S. service members were killed Friday evening after their aircraft suffered a mishap and crashed into the eastern Mediterranean Sea, the Pentagon revealed Sunday.  The mishap took place “during a routine air refueling mission as part of military training,” and all onboard the aircraft were killed, U.S. European Command (EUCOM) said in a brief...

title: Netanyahu calls claims of Israel breaking international law ‘hogwash’
description: Israeli Prime Minster Benjamin Netanyahu on Sunday pushed back on claims that Israeli is breaking international law in its war with militant group Hamas, calling such arguments "hogwash." Pressed on NBC's "Meet the Press" about the argubment by the United Nations High Commissioner for Human Rights that the "collective punishment" of Palestinians amounts to a...

title: Sullivan: ‘No reoccupation of Gaza’ in future
description: National security adviser Jake Sullivan on Sunday emphasized the U.S.'s stance on the future of Gaza, arguing the U.S. believes the basic principles of the future include "no reoccupation of Gaza" and "no forcible displacement of the Palestinian people." Asked by CBS News "Face the Nation" anchor Margaret Brennan about Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's...

title: CNN host presses Netanyahu to accept responsibility for Oct. 7
description: CNN anchor Dana Bash pressed Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu to respond to Israeli concerns on whether he would accept some responsibility for failing to anticipate the Oct. 7 massacre in an interview on Sunday. In response, Netanyahu repeatedly dodged the issue, saying on CNN’s “State of the Union” that he would discuss those concerns...

title: Haley dismisses Trump’s strong lead: People are ‘getting tired’ of ‘drama and chaos’
description: Republican presidential candidate Nikki Haley dismissed former President Trump's strong lead in the polls, arguing people are "getting tired" of the "drama and chaos" that "follow" the former president. Pointing to a recent piece from The Hill on Trump's massive lead in the polls dealing a blow to rivals, Fox News anchor Shannon Bream asked...

title: 'SNL' parodies GOP debate in cold open
description: The latest episode of "Saturday Night Live" mocked last week's GOP presidential primary in the cold open and brought the focus to former President Trump, who was notably absent from the debate but heavily discussed among the candidates. Playing NBC News anchor Lester Holt, who co-moderated last week's debate, Keenan Thompson kicked off the cold...

title: Hate roundabouts? Avoid these states — they have the most
description: What goes around comes around, and what seems to be coming around is more and more roundabouts.

title: Biden loses ground with young voters, prompting Dem concerns
description: Democrats are raising concerns that President Biden’s standing among young voters is in jeopardy after polling released this week showed Biden effectively tied with former President Trump among young voters.  A New York Times/Siena College survey released Monday showed Biden virtually tied with Trump among voters younger than 30, with 30 percent backing Biden and...

title: Jill Stein adds to Biden's 2024 problems
description: President Biden, already facing dismal approval numbers and multiple liberals looking to replace him, got more unwelcome news this week with the entry of Jill Stein into the 2024 race.  Stein, who announced on Thursday that she would seek the Green Party nomination for the second time, is considered a fringe and intrusive figure to...

title: Trump’s battle in New York turns increasingly personal
description: Former President Trump’s civil trial rail over his business practices in New York City, where he built his business brand and won international fame, seems to have struck a nerve. Trump, the front-runner for the GOP’s presidential nomination next year, is facing charges in Washington, D.C., for his attempts to remain in power after losing...
